name: Remain Nameless
text: Ward.... you were a little hard on the Beaver. The worst place in Oxford is on the south side of Hwy 78 East. The BEST place is A&B and they are located on the north side of 78 just east of Hutch Touch. I'm in retail sales in the trailer industry myself and A & B Trailers is my go to source for information, parts, and trailers. If  I have a question about ANYTHING in regards to dragging a wagon... A&B Trailers.. Knowledge level? I'll put it this way; theres not anything they can't  cover on your trailer.  I promise, they will never lead you wrong. These guys are not pencil pushers that have sit behind a desk all of their lives. They are blue collar, hard working, hands on, highly experienced fabricators and they know their stuff. If you want to spend half of your retirement on junk just to have it fall apart in a few months, then go across the street and shop with Ward. Now if you want an extremely well built, solid piece of equipment at a reasonable price  from an excellent company that stands behind their product AND appreciates their customers?... Welcome home family!! You are in the right place. A&B Trailers. You won't find better people anywhere and let me just add this in there.... these cats are Perfectionists. I know. I have worked side by side with them in a fab shop and I am a perfectionist also, but these jokers....well they take it to a whole nother other level. I will take an oath to say, "They do things at A&B with a whole bunch of heart and a truck load of pride. It's done once, done right, and that's the product they will provide you every single time. I highly recommend A&B Trailers for all of your parts, accessories,  tires, wheels, batteries, or even if you are looking to upgrade with a brand new piece of pride attached to your vehicle.. Come on down to A&B. I'm sure glad I stopped here. Received a solid product and made two friends for life. Where else can you get service like that? A&B Trailers. Ask for Andy or Barney. NO need in referencing my review. They'll know who sent ya when you call them by their names 🤣

name: Helen White
text: I orginally posted a 5 star for this company. But after the delivery of building I purchased, very disappointing experience.  The delivery driver charged an additional $100 for the height and still wasn't at the height for the charge. We had to redo all blocks because it wasn't level or supported correctly. Was basically told not responseable for third party, I didn't purchase it from third party purchased from this business.

name: Carl Jernigan
text: Can't say enough about the customer service i received. I brought my RV motorhome for service on my generator fuel line. I needèd repairs done within a week for trip i was about to take. No one else would even look at it. Not only did they replace the fuel line but i also needed new shocks which i purchased and they installed them no problem and gave me recommendations on other stuff that needed fixing which i took care of also. Great staff and professional work. A++

resp.text: Thank you for the glowing recommendation. We appreciate you!

name: Taylar TLC
text:
This is an update to my original review upon receiving a call and efforts to make it right from Marc the Service Manager.  As you all know, many businesses won't even take the time to contact a lost customer.  Marc not only reached out but followed up with us to confirm we were taken care of, even though we had to pull our truck.  He made no excuses and stated that the communication errors were taken seriously and will be addressed.  Ultimately our repair had to been completed elsewhere but Williams still followed up and showed accountability.  I would be comfortable continuing to use W.W. Williams as I have at various locations.  However, I would advise that you seek assistance from Management if communication is lacking.  I wish we had done so sooner.

Be aware that every experience isn't the same.  We had a truck towed in to this location due to the good reviews and communication with the tech on our call.  We were told that our truck would be looked at first thing the following day.  Day 1, truck not looked at, we were told someone went home sick.  This was after we called to get an update.  We were told it would be looked at the following a.m.
Day 2,  I we provided the potential location of the issue after speaking with our home mechanic.  We asked how pics could be sent to get things rolling.  We emailed a pic of the part and diagnostic which was from a recent repair of another unit with the same problem.  We followed back up after not hearing anything mid day.  The truck was not looked at by mid-day we were told this time 2 people were out.
Day 3, Calls and face to face contact again resulted in no action, the truck was not looked at.
Day 4, We went to location to try to nail down a realistic expectation of when the truck would be touched.  We were told they would try by late afternoon but could not say for sure, this came from advisement with the shop supervisor.

This has been the worst experience we have had with a WW Williams which we use often locally.  Our confidence in towing the truck was due to the quality of work and professionalism we experienced in the past.  This location has not met the standard exemplified by the WW Williams name.  Truitt has not followed up with us nor provided a realistic time table to address the misinformation provided prior to the town in.  We understand staff issues occur, especially in the current pandemic climate.  However, there is no excuse for not providing updates nor treating all customers with the same level of priority.  The business is open, there are technicians present, and trucks being worked on.  Yet, we have not been serviced nor updated with an expected diagnostic date.  The cost of being out of service has been extended due to the poor service standard.  Beware before taking your truck here.  Sitting and no communication is not a reasonable expectation and very costly in trucking.

resp.text: Thank you so much for updating this and we do hope that we can do better for you in the future!

name: Kenneth Knight
text: Very  nice customer service.....and the service department was great

name: Lauren Thornell
text: Ashley and the team are STUPENDOUS!!!!

name: Bach Wilson
text:
This company took advantage of us and ripped us off.

I am a mechanic, but I don't often vacation with all of my tools, so I know what I am talking about here.

We suffered transmission problems on our motor home on Memorial Day weekend. AAA got us in touch with W. W. Williams. I described our problem over the phone to W. W. Williams. The front seal was leaking badly, our transmission was functioning normally as long as it had fluid in it, however was leaking too rapidly to drive. The mechanic on call nearly insisted that he come out and have a look at it on site, however I told him there was nothing that could be done on the side of the road. We decided we would spend the night on the side of the road and have it towed to W. W. Williams the next day.

The next day we had the RV towed to W. W. Williams. The mechanic on call insisted that we let him come out and put the RV inside the gates, even though we were not worried about it as it was a very industrial area. The mechanic came out and was nice and spent about 10 minutes installing the driveshaft since it had been removed by the towing company. We again explained and showed him the problem and he assured us that it would be no big deal for them to repair. The shop was very nice and appeared to be well equipped. The mechanic estimated 8-10 hours labor for the repair. He waited another 20 minutes for our ride home to arrive and we left.

A few days later W. W. Williams called to say that they could not repair our RV. They said that since it was leaking from the front seal, they wouldn't have the tooling. They charged $600 to tell us this, which is very upsetting because I told them that was what the problem was from square one and several more times after that. They justified their price by a minimum 4 hour charge for the guy to meet us to put it behind the gate, and then a inspection fee on top of that to glance underneath the camper. Their seasoned mechanic should have been able to make that call right away, and charging for an inspection is ridiculous as this could and should have been done by the mechanic while we were paying for his 4hr service call, he had plenty of time for that as he was with us for an hour or less. The tooling is also a very lame excuse.

This company clearly took advantage of us, and figured they could make an easy profit without having to touch our RV. Life is expensive enough as it is, we don't need to gouge each other. I am really upset that I told them our problem from the very beginning and they still put us through all of this.
call right awaycl

name: lydicake yumyum
text: Repaired my brother's truck in a timely manner, and compared to other places we've taken his truck their work is thorough. Costly, but worth every penny.

It is always our intent to provide our customers with service that meets their expectations, and if we failed in that effort, we are deeply apologetic. name: Chad Smith
text: I called because our travel trailer had a broken axle.  What a responsive group of people and so very kind.  We are still waiting on some parts to come in from Dexter, but they have been nothing but wonderful so far.  Great there are such good people still on this earth.

name: Larry White
text: Came out in a timely manner, saved me from having to get a tow truck when they have tow trucks. Didn’t just fix the problem, but also adjusted my trailer brakes bcuz he saw an axle sticking with no charge. Looked over my truck and found other problems as well. Worked all day until 4 am trying to fix my truck bcuz my driver was under a load. Checked my boxes and saw they both was low in gear oil. Topped them off and told me I had a yoke seal leak and a drive axle leak. Didn’t charge me for the oil he put in my truck. Cut down the price so I could get everything fixed bcuz he didn’t want me having problems down on the road. Sent pictures of all the malfunctioning parts and sent pictures of the new parts once installed. Called and texted the next day to make sure everything was going fine. Charged me less than what I would’ve got charged anywhere else knowingly bcuz my money was funny due to me just paying  to get my motor rebuilt by another mechanic. Told me the other problems I needed to get done in the future. I know honest mechanics are hard to come by but I have been blessed to find one and will continue doing business with this knowledgeable and honest family owned mechanic shop.  Thanks Adam!

name: Katrena Mills
text:
Family Owned
Great service
Great prices

text: Car broke down on I85 Saturday afternoon. Tigerstate towed us to their shop. The parts wouldn't be available until Sunday morning so they gave us a ride to a motel. The next morning the car was fixed and they picked us up. All at a reasonable price. Very nice people and very helpful. Our thanks to everyone at Tigerstate.

name: Michael Walton
text: These guys are awesome! Had a catastrophic wheel failure while towing a trailer at about 11 PM in the rain. These guys came and towed both my truck and trailer to their shop quickly and professionally. They were going to take me to a hotel for the night but when they asked where I was headed and found out I had a plane to catch the next day to see family they immediately got work on my vehicle (it was almost midnight at this point). They found enough lug nuts to fit my oversized Land Rover wheels and got me back on the road that night! Top notch service and some genuinely good people. Recommend highly!

name: Kid Sparkle
text:
I was having trailer issues on the way to Louisiana and these nice folks were able to help me out even though the tech was already up most of the night and had little sleep.

I was extremely pleased with their politeness and service!

name: Nathan Barber
text: Adam stayed with us until 2:30 am repairing our trailer to ensure we were ready for the road again. Truly great service!

name: Ididodi Ididodi
text: If your truck break in the area you can consider yourself lucky. Family owned business, honest  people and fair prices.

name: Dale Kiddy
text:
Just want to say that you will never find a better group of people than the family of Tigerstate Truck and Trailer.  After being left broke down on the shoulder of the road by another repair company.  Adam,  William and Holly went the extra mile to get my truck and trailer towed to their location and helped me secure a motel for the night.  The next morning they picked me up and to the shop so  another driver could continue with the load. (This was a Sunday morning). Adam did a check of the truck and found it was a transmission failure . They made sure that I had a room for Sunday .
On Monday they went over 100 miles each way to get a transmission and other parts and had me back on the road at a very reasonable price on Tuesday.
This is a family owned company and very professional and I would highly recommend them.  If you need anything stop by and Jo ,Holly, Adam and William and have a cup of coffee.

text: Friendly, reasonably priced, great service. Could not have been happier. Will go back when in the area. Mechanics were awesome. Thanks for saving our day. Todd and marie

name: G Andrews
text: If I could give negative 5 stars I would. My truck was knocking and he was rude and wouldn't give me the time of day after 5 min of questioning he finally told me to try Matthew's but he wouldn't trust him to change the oil in my lawn mower, now I see why, Matthew's are Damn good guys and great mechanics. Don't waste your time going to Garrett's he won't help you

resp.text: I would like to apologize for you experience you had at Garrett, I do think you are confused as to what was said and why no service was performed. You demanded an oil change to be performed right then and we were unable to accommodate you with your request. I would like to offer you a free oil change if you would like to "schedule " one with our shop clerk.

name: Michael Attipoe
text: This shop is the best place I must recommend to the truck drivers. I read their reviews and I went there. And their reviews are true.   Good peoples  +   job well done =  happiest OTR drivers

resp.text: Thanks Michael! We appreciate your business as well!

name: Jeff Stephens
text: Great place to get a truck fixed reasonable price an fixed right the first time i would recommend garret truck repair i will be back when my truck need to be fixed

name: Terry Reese
text: Thanks for the help.

name: Paul Sheppard
text: First of all, I have never left a review , good or bad until this one. Garretts accepted from me in March 2018 a check for the sum of a little over $18,000.00 for a rebuild on my 2012 Peterbuilt. Was given a 12 month warranty on engine but at 14 months and 127,000 miles later my engine went down. I had it towed to a shop for inspection of fault. Mechanic told and showed me the two head bolts nearest the fire wall that were not torqued properly. I paid their price for rebuild but did not receive in return what I paid for because head bolts that are “properly “ torqued do not just back off. I don’t know to many people that can pay over $18,000.00 for something and do not receive in return what they paid for and stay in business long after. Praise God , I am still in business by only His Grace but maybe in the future your mechanics can focus on doing it right the first time instead of bad mouthing other mechanics in your area. A proud look is an enemy to God. If you are that good then they would overlook the basic things that are so very important.........

name: Carol McFeron
text: After hurricane Florence on our way back to California the fuel pump on our 7.3 diesel truck blew & started leaking badly. Even though Garrett was slammed 1 week before Christmas, Dustin the owner found a way to squeeze in our repair.  With diesels nothing is easy or simple.  We're back on the road to San Diego heading back home.  THANK YOU Dustin & crew!!!

text: Quick service

name: Danny Miles Isbell jr
text: Fixed my 07 Pete in only 2 days, but on the 2nd day on the road the check engine light came back on again,  for the same thing.

name: Jimmy Weathers
text: Good service

name: The Crafty Trucker
text: Had to stop here for new batteries. Had us out of there and back on the road in 20 mins. Friendly folks too

name: Kelly Klein
text: Excellent services and fair prices!!!  Would recommend them to anyone!!!

name: Thomas Rocha
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good fast and friendly service

(Original)
Mui buen servicio rápido y amable

name: Paul Kuehn
text: I can’t say enough good about how Brandon took care of me. A couple of buddies and I were traveling back from Daytona Beach to Arkansas when we experienced a tire separation and broken leaf spring on the trailer. Brandon saved our trip by providing outstanding service to get us back on the road safely. He even gave us a great restaurant recommendation since we were all hungry. Thanks again for the prompt customer service.

name: J Irby
text: I highly suggest anyone to shop here. I will not be buying anything trailer related from anyone else. I was very satisfied with the service I received. I would give more stars if I could.

name: Conner Jung
text: Great group that will help you out in anyways and make suggestions on what you should do or don't have to worry about. They aren't there to rip you off. They are there to help and get you back on the water as quick as possible. They have great prices that you can't hardly find anywhere.

name: Daniel Payton
text: This is my new go-to spot for all things trailer related. Best customer service in town hands down.

name: Vaughn Traywick
text: Brandon and his crew did a great job setting up a trailer for my new boat.  They even notified me (and photographed) a few major issues with the actual boat that I will get resolved with the manufacturer.  This is outstanding customer service.

name: Scott Dauenheimer
text: They have everything you need to repair a trailer or buy a new boat trailer at the best price I could find any where within 100 miles.

name: JWDozer
text: Very impatient.  Looking at a boat that was still on the internet... "don't have it bye!"

name: divots dad
text: Brandon and his staff  offer the BEST prices and service in Mobile hands down!

name: Johnathan Schemerhorn
text: Great honest operation here I called 20 trailer places in the entire area only one who called me back and got me a trailer Fast and fair prices

name: Ryan Brightman
text: Brandon was a life saver this weekend.  I had a hub blow out on the side of the road on a Saturday.  Brandon was nice enough to meet me at his shop on a Saturday to sell me a hub to get me going.  Best customer service experience I have had in years.

name: Jason Riemann
text: Best place in Mobile for Quality trailer parts and service, boat sales, and engiine service. 4 tires and wheels installed and engine serviced in a few hours! More fishing time.  Can’t recommend anyone else.

name: Travis Poling
text: Great in every way! Friendly service and GREAT prices and selection. THE place to go for everything boat trailer related.

name: Josh McNickle
text: I purchased a boat from recreational sales and service just over a year ago and was very pleased with service received from Brandon during my purchase. I have and will continue to refer people to recreational sales and service for all boating and trailer needs. Great place!

name: Glen Chaplin
text: Have used several times and always had great service.  Have called ahead to see if they could stay past closing time for me to pick up what I needed!

name: chad palmer
text: We have a multi boat charter business and could not do it without these guys. Fast super friendly and great in stock inventory

name: Thomas Miller
text: Great service. Will definitely go back

name: Ben Nelson
text: Excellent selection of trailer parts in stock

name: Reese Swartz
text: Man, what a bunch of nice guys!  Great transaction!

name: Jon Dreaden
text: If you need trailer parts or service,  this is the only place to go.  Very friendly staff.

name: Robert Rhodes
text: Brandon and his staff always have what we need at great prices & great service.

name: Michael Robinson
text: Best place to get what you need for your trailer

name: riverrat1946@yahoo.com Lunceford
text: Great place to get your boat fixed or tailer parts and repaired

name: Greg Callaghan
text: Brandon is very knowledgeable, I was looking for boat trailer parts

name: Aaron Allen
text: Needed help on the side of the road and not from the area. Brandon was refered to us and had everything to get us going. Thanks

name: Judson Taylor
text: Excellent customer service. Friendly. I got just what I needed no extras.

name: jonathan brown
text: You may have 99 problems a trailer problem shouldn't be on that lost with a place like this. Brandon has got it together, Mobile has needed a place like this for a long time.

name: Shirley Olson
text: Very professional and polite

name: David Rinaldi
text: Done right. Done quick

name: Marc Mott
text: Everything you need for your trailer and more.

name: Butch W.
text: Knoesgable and Friendly

name: Rod Cromer
text: Knowledgeable,  friendly and helpful

name: Hayden Lunceford
text: Nice place to do business.

name: H Pipkins
text: Great service!

name: Brandon Lunceford
text: Was blown away buy the inventory and cheap prices.

name: Twanskey Colvin
text: I had a very  satisfying experience at Trailer World. Chris is a real down to earth guy. You can’t help but to like him....lol...but he helped me in every way he could and he kept his word all the way down to the last signature. I’ll most definitely be doing business there again and I would recommend Trailer World to anyone. And very well built Trailers. Thanks Chris! 🙏🏾

name: The Adventurous Mom
text:
CP was helpful and nice with purchase of trailer. Prices are great too.

The only bad thing is, when I got home I did a thorough inspection and find a big scratch on the fender.  I wish I had noticed this there but I did not. :(  The company response was that it wouldn't rust and they aren't sure how it got there.

name: Zach Lott
text: Phenomenal customer service by Chris Wallace.  Brought my trailer in that I bought from another dealer because the tail and running lights and one interior light were not working. He quickly determined it was a blown fuse for the tail and running lights and helped me repair the interior light on the spot without charging me. I was expecting to have to drop off the trailer to get it fixed. I was in and out in 30 minutes. It  was awesome to have someone make life a lot easier that day. Can't recommend Chris and Trailer World Alabama enough. To put it simply, he is one solid dude and sincerely wants to take care of customers! Every business could use a guy of his caliber! Thanks again Chris for the help; you're the man!

name: Camelia Shears
text: If you’re looking to purchase a trailer you should definitely make this your first stop. They have great prices and a very helpful and friendly staff. I had the pleasure of being helped by Chris. Chris provided me an excellent customer service experience and for that reason I am a loyal customer for life. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: ashley allen
text: Great service, friendly staff. We're so excited

name: Kevin Seahorn
text: Amazing people to deal with. Chris was great, made everything so easy and and a quick turnaround.on the trailer. I will definitely be back again and send all my friends to them. You can't go wrong

name: Chris Sowell
text: Purchased multiple trailers over the years. Some directly from the inventory yard while others have been custom made. Always have been happy with each trailer. My needs/purpose changed which always led me back to trailer world to mfg my new one. Great service and they have always stood behind any issues that came up (which thankfully was many many years ago). Does what it was built for and fits everything I need!

name: Herbert Agueda
text: I'm thoroughly pleased with my experience with Trailer World, If you're in the market for a trailer, this should be your go to place!! Chris is very knowledgeable and more than willing to jump thru hoops to make sure you get exactly what you're looking for!! They won't try to sell you something you don't need. Quality construction done in a timely manner and you won't feel like you just came from the proctologist office!! First rate customer service, friendly staff, well built equipment, what else could you ask for?

name: Nathan Ring
text: Wonderful company and Wonderful people! Would recommend to anyone and everyone, you won’t be disappointed!

name: Chase Lawrence
text: Great quality trailers at a reasonable and affordable price with excellent customer service to match 👌🏼

name: taylor starling
text: Trevor was amazing! He was so helpful when I purchased my trailer!

name: david vitulski
text: Great selection of trailers at very reasonable prices and the staff was courteous, very helpful and professional.

name: Jesus Catala
text: Highly recommend this place if you need to buy or service your trailer.

name: Cameron Lee
text: Great products and excellent customer service! Highly recommended!

name: Robbie Swanson
text: Great service..absolutely best pricing..and the staff was more than willing to meet my needs. I would say if you are in need of a trailer or anything having to do with a trailer go to trailer world in Ozark..

name: Ellen Farmer
text: Incredible company! Everyone is so nice and helpful.

name: Hobie Turvin
text: Great customer and always will to help! Chris always goes above and beyond for what I need!

name: Trent Sanders
text: BEST SERVICE!! HIGHLY RECCOMEND

name: Emily Wallace
text: Great place, Chris was very knowledgeable and willing to help!

name: phillip aldenderfer
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff, extremely happy with service.

name: Rock Estes
text: Great product.  Love my trailer!!!

name: Trevor Adkins
text: Great place, Trevor was very informative and helpful

name: Neelee Wallace
text: chris is an amazing salesman he was very kind and helpful.

name: dan chandler
text: Bought trailor in December. promised next week,next week next week.  it is March now.

name: Silverback STFFST
text: Great place great staff

name: Barry Jones
text: Want return any of my calls tried 4 different times

resp.text: Hey Barry I’m sorry for the inconvenience. What’s a good number or email to reach you? I’ll have a manager reach out first thing in the morning and we will do our best to earn your business back.

name: PAKMAIL PAKMAIL
text: Great product and great people

name: Heather Lynn
text: When you get there there's great customer service and very helpful and great salesperson

name: Sunny Clark
text: Superb customer service! Very helpful!

name: Josh Penton
text: Friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Ken Faint
text: Nice, friendly and knowledgeable sales staff.  Thank you Chris for jumping through hoops to get my last minute tire upgrade done. This is probably a half dozen trailers I've bought from these guys and I will be back for the next one too!

name: Shiftie Mcgee
text: The only thing keeping me from shopping here, is the fact they don't even list a base price for their products. Sadly, I'm sure I'm not the only person to do this.

resp.text: Hey Shiftie, I'm sorry you feel that way. You can call any Trailer World dealership and a salesmen can price you any trailer we offer. You can also email whatever is easiest

name: Ryan Pope
text: Quick and painless, very competitive pricing and offered several financing options! Thanks Chris!

name: bcflys
text: A little bit of a drive, but worth the customer service and the quality of their products. These guys are pro's and will listen and get you in the perfect trailer for a great price. This is my 3rd major perchase with trailorworld. And I'm very happy with the deal and my new LoadTrail trailers. Chris went above and beyond getting my trailers set up exactly the way I wanted them. Thank you guys.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and thank you for your business!

name: Alex Wetherington
text: I’ve purchased 4 trailers now from trailer world and always been happy until I purchased my most recent trailer a 6x16 I had custom built. After about a week of having this trailer I noticed the the paint chipping pretty bad on the wheel wells, I called and they sent me a can of spray paint to cover over it. It’s now been about 2 months since I’ve had the trailer and the whole trailer is chipping paint really really bad. The trailers I’ve had in the past have never had this problem but this trailer is chipping extremely bad.

name: Shane Key
text: Had everything ready for me!

name: Nikki Haire
text: I had to buy trailer tires for my boat a few weeks ago.  They were an odd size, but they had them in stock.  These guys were great!  Clay and Bo will be getting my business for all of my future trailer needs!

name: Frankie Sutton
text: After having my trailer for 2 weeks they managed to change one brake assembly. I picked up trailer today after them telling me it could be monday or so before they could finish it. Brought trailer home to install other brake assembly and brakes still not working. After I finally got brakes working correctly on the assmbly I installed, I removed hub that they installed on the same side on the rear tandem. When removing the hub I removed the hub nuts with my hand, they werent even tight. After removing hub and inspecting it noticed that the new seal they had installed was goulded and the spindle was also goulded. Have to replace seal again on the new one they just installed. Have had issues with brakes from the day i purchased trailer. I run hotshot loads and cant afford to be down as long as they had my trailer and still have to go behind them to replace stuff. I have replaced the seals on this trailer twice now and replaced 2 magnets on the brakes with no warranty applied. As for as purchasing trailer I could not ask for better service, but maintenance and offering warranty coverage for parts, there has not been any mention of it other than the brake assemblies.

name: Fred Eurich
text: It was a pleasure to do business with. Great price on the trailer. Everyone was kind and professional. Thank you.

name: Daniel Ring
text: Knowledgeable, helpful and friendly sales people.  Best prices in the region for Brand New Trailers!

name: Kolby Green
text: It has competitive utility/equipment trailer prices.

name: Art V
text: Great folks that work there ..!

name: Tammy Narup
text: These guys are rock stars!!! Wheel bearing went out on our trailer, we wound up buying a new trailer, they went way above and beyond to help us get the new trailer set up for business and back on the road! Thanks guys, you saved the trip!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review!

name: Debie Lynn
text:
we were all excited about being able to empty out a rented storage  and be able to have all our belongs with us.  My husband works on the road and we travel alot.  Got to this place and there was one man working.  Two ppl ahead of us.  He told us he would be with us after them. Understandable right? WRONG.  More ppl showed up and he never waited on us. We had CASH money and CAME to BUY. Hate he missed a great sell and I hope he thought it was worth the loss of a sale and a
BAD reputation when ppl ask us about it.

name: Jeff White
text: Good place to get a trailer.

name: Kevin Pitcock
text: Best value on the market. The craftsmanship and attention to detail surpasses other small time builders at a price that is fair. For the $ you won't find anything better. Built to last!

name: Kevin Ellison
text: Excellent staff with excellent service. I would personally advise anyone in need of a trailer to speak with Chris. His professionalism, in my opinion, is top notch and can't be matched. He will work tirelessly in order to ensure the best deal possible, along with providing outstanding customer satisfaction.

name: Andrew Jones
text: Solid company that makes well built and reliable trailers.  I will always buy my trailers from trailer world!

name: Neil Simmons
text: Trailer world is the best. It’s the only place to go if you need a trailer. Their staff and prices are second to none.

name: Ted Herring
text: Awesome service. Great products, trailers are top quality,  not cheap, but quality and that's what We need.  Thank you.

name: charles cutts
text: Awesome people to work with and great product. This is our 2nd trailer we have bought from them.

name: Johnny Kincey
text: Great customer service and a fantastic trailer

name: Jeffrey Barth
text: Very helpful staff and have a good knowledge of their products.  Price i paid for tow doll was great.

name: Glen Pratt
text: Friendly and knowledgeable personnel. Good prices on quality trailers.

name: Summer Knight
text:
All of us kids and grandkids bought  a trailer for our grandfather because he is always helping somebody move something or build something. We ran out of ideas. His birthday is the same as Thanksgiving this year so he was shocked and thrilled by a surprise party plus Thanksgiving. Thank you Mr Bradley for all your hard work dealing with the whole family and a few friends. We looked at every single trailer on the lot more than once. It took us several months to raise the money but we did it!
We bought the  6’ x 12’ white trailer. Our grandpa is out of that lazy boy and going again. 🙌🏼 We need to get him some steps next for the back of his truck.

name: Gary Mcallister
text: Great place to get a trailer. Friendly staff. Prices are reasonable.

name: Jesica Woods
text: Dothan Al dose not answer the phone and you can not leave a message so they can return your call.

name: Joe F. Watson
text: Great place to buy utility trailer at an affordable price.

name: Johnny Spann
text: Well Andrew was a pretty good guy with a likable personality and the guy knows what he is doing when we hooked the trailer up to my 2016 4 runner some of the lights didn't work Andrew said man you have a blown fuse I said nope new truck but I checked anyway and old Andrew was right. Well they just got my business next time I need another trailer

name: Anita Baird
text: Excellent customer service and excellent selection. Will definitely go back for all of our trailer needs.

name: Edwin Knowles
text: Good people and will help you

name: Laketh Sweet
text: Great!

name: Ram 2017
text:
I went to trailer world to buy a trailer that i had spoke with the sales man a day before and i had asked him tge price of it which he told me. So i said i would be down the next day to get it. When i got there the next day i had ask him alittle more info on the trailer well he acted like he didn't know that much about it. So i said this is the one that we talked about the day before. So he just stood there like he didn't  remember. So i ssid this is the one that you told me the price. Then i told him the price and he said no thst not the price i had drove 110 miles to he's company and now he change the price. We went inside and he acted like he didn't  want to sale the trailer at all. Very cold to me NOT professional at all. So i left his store after driving 110 miles. WOW VERY POOR  SALES PERSON..
WELL NOT EVER GO BACK AND WELL TELL VERY BODY ABOUT THAT PLACE.

name: Pamela McKinney
text: Drove from Florida to purchased a trailer and the guy stayed after hours until we got there, even in the rain.  Awesome customer service...highly recommend.

name: Paul Guerrero
text: Not much of a world more of a lot.

name: Roger Jones
text: Good price on our trailer and well built still going strong

name: Charles Petty
text: Had the tire I needed at a reasonable price.

name: jerry chandler
text: Had the parts for my rig . Mr.jerry

name: Donnie Skinner
text: Great people and prices!

name: Mitch Kadow
text: First rate trailer supplier. The show room is impeccable. They truly have any and anything you would need to meet your trailering needs. A friendly knowledgeable staff will answer any questions you have. I only wish I had found them a year ago!

name: Bruce Andrews
text:
This is a fantastic place to visit for all of your trailer needs.
The staff is pleasant and very knowledgeable.
This place is not a disappointment!!!

name: Rasheek Morris
text: Man, when I tell you this place has the best diesel mechanics I ever seen or dealt with before.

name: stephen nelson
text: Awesome service. Andrew is a very honest businessman and is always extremely helpful with his attention and detail. If you need a part, roadside service, or a tow than Andrew and Omni Fleet will take care of you!

name: Dennie Bishop
text:
I have had two major repairs done by Omni Fleet Services and I am completely satisfied with their work. As a small businessman, I am VERY picky about who works on my equipment. It is my main source of income. If the truck don't work, I can't work.

On both occasions the service was major. They diagnosed the problem efficiently and repaired it promptly. Just the problem, nothing else! The business owner is on site and even works along with the guys in the shop.

I am very satisfied with the service that I have received. My truck runs like a scalded dog again. Like it did when it was new.

I appreciate being treated like a valuable customer and I highly recommend them! Thanks Andrew!

name: Kevin Edwards
text: Awesome service, facility and employees. Highly recommend.

name: Scottie Couch
text: These guys are awesome

name: Rasheek Morris
text: Best service around..

name: Bolt Movers
text:
The repair team at Omni Fleet is awesome and we have used their service on many occasions. Some occasions at their facility and other occurrences they dispatched to our location.  Andrew has always put in great effort when we needed him on short notice and they provide a great service.

Thank you Omni Fleet

resp.text: Thank you!  We value your trust and business!

name: Charles Bryant
text: Good mechanical work. Great attitude very attentive. I would recommend for all your truck work.

name: Nikola Tasic
text: Awesome customer service, have only good words for these guys, accurate in estimate prices, would definetly reccomend them

resp.text: Thank you.  It was a pleasure doing business with you.

name: June Jenkins
text: Good people's dart drew he number 1

text: Guys that work there are friendly, efficient, and honest.

name: Jeffrey Cronk
text: I work here. Its great

name: Thomas Richardson
text: Great people, service and prices.

name: Amy Strickland
text: Excellent price, product, and customer service!!

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: Michael us amazing and kind and helpful.  He sold us the golf cart we have which was an AMAZING DEAL!!!  We have had it for over 4 years and no issues it runs like a brand new one.  Love it!!!  If you need a trailer or a cart this is the place to go.

name: Tommy Zaffina
text: they took great care of my golf cart at a very fair price

name: Bill Crum
text: I got a great price on a golf cart.

name: John Weeks
text: On a trip to Atlanta to pick up a motorcycle I had a bearing failure on the trailer.   The staff saved my trip! Great price, great service, and just nice guys!  Thanks again guys!

name: Melissa Kenney
text: I had a great experience. Lance and his staff are extremely helpful, and made the purchase of my utility trailer a breeze. Thanks guys!  I love my trailer!

name: David Coleman
text: Good service and fair price

name: J Bishop
text: Lance and his staff are absolutely top notch! I can’t say enough good about them. They bent over backwards for me on a trailer purchase with accessories. Outstanding experience and I would deal with them again! Absolutely amazing customer service, very friendly and honest!

name: gustavius Maxie
text: Great people to work with i purchased a great golf cart and a enclosed trailer best pieces in town

name: Michael Reed
text: Helpful and friendly  and honest people and i will be back

name: Garrett Pass
text: Very pleased with the help and service I received from TNT Outfitters.  I found them to be very honest people and not just trying to make a sell. Good business.

name: Ron Rothenstine
text: They were very helpful and the only place that was open, I would recommend them to my friends.

name: Asher Flatt
text: The staff at TNT Outfitters was extremely helpful and had exactly what we were looking for.  I highly recommend Truck-N-Trailer Outfitters for golf carts and trailers!  And my husband loves the truck accessories!
